casebody.data:
Lyle LADUKE, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Thomas David STAPERT and Dawn M. Stapert, Defendant-Appellees,
and
Sarah Schuring-Balle, Mary Weeks, Cathy Weeks, Williams E. Sparks, Randolph W. Noel, Deborah D. Loomis, Frank W. Smetana, Mary A. Smetana, John P. Morris, Jerald Reitenour, Judy Reitenour, Douglas Kirk, Kathy Kirk, David T. Hutchins, Crystal A. Briden, and Kelly S. Briden, Defendants. SC: 157447
COA: 338239 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 13, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
